Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE FUNCTION "PPM"."ODF_AUD_STATIC_LOV_FCT" ( P_LOOKUP_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, P_CODE_VALUE IN VARCHAR2, P_ID_VALUE IN NUMBER, P_ENUM_VALUE IN NUMBER, P_LANGUAGE_CODE IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT 'en') RETURN VARCHAR2 IS V_RETURN_VALUE VARCHAR2(2100); BEGIN IF P_ID_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN select id into V_RETURN_VALUE from ODF_AUD_LOOKUP_CAPTIONS where is_latest=1 and language_code=P_LANGUAGE_CODE and pk_id= P_ID_VALUE; ELSIF P_ENUM_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN select id into V_RETURN_VALUE from ODF_AUD_LOOKUP_CAPTIONS where is_latest=1 and language_code=P_LANGUAGE_CODE and pk_id = (select id from cmn_lookups where lookup_type=P_LOOKUP_TYPE and lookup_enum= P_ENUM_VALUE); ELSE select id into V_RETURN_VALUE from ODF_AUD_LOOKUP_CAPTIONS where is_latest=1 and language_code=P_LANGUAGE_CODE and pk_id = (select id from cmn_lookups where lookup_type=P_LOOKUP_TYPE and lookup_code= P_CODE_VALUE); END IF; RETURN V_RETURN_VALUE; END;
